document.title: Managing editor, Russel Hirst presents copy of IJNS to Ron Lehman
document.abstract: Dr. Hirst presents copy of IJNS to Ron Lehman, Counselor to the Director of Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory; Chair, U.S. Dept. of of Defense Threat Reduction Advisory Committee; Chair, Governing Board of International Science and Technology Center; Former Asst. Secretary for International Security Policy, U.S. Department of Defense; Former Ambassador and U.S. Chief Negotiator on Strategic Offensive Arms (START I); Former Deputy Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs, ETC. (Offut Air Force Base, Nebraska, USA, March 2017).
